Repository Layer

Слой работы с данными.

Repository Interface

class IWalkerRepo[source]

Bases: ABC

Interface for file system repository operations.

abstractmethod static get_tree(path, allowed_ext)[source]

Builds a file system tree structure.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Root path to build tree from.

  • allowed_ext (List[str]) – List of allowed file extensions.

Return type:

Directory

Returns:

Directory object representing the file system tree.

abstractmethod static create_new_entry(dest)[source]

Creates a new directory entry.

Parameters:

dest (str) – Destination directory path.

Return type:

str

Returns:

Path to created directory.

abstractmethod static copy_file(source_path, target_path)[source]

Copies a file from source to target location.

Parameters:

  • source_path (str) – Path to source file.

  • target_path (str) – Path to target location.

Raises:

Exception – If copying fails.

Return type:

None

abstractmethod static create_directories(path)[source]

Creates directories recursively.

Parameters:

path (str) – Path where directories should be created.

Return type:

None

Repository Implementation

class WalkerRepository[source]

Bases: IWalkerRepo

Concrete implementation of file system repository.

static create_new_entry(dest)[source]

Creates a new directory and returns its path.

Parameters:

dest (str) – Destination directory path.

Return type:

str

Returns:

Path to created directory.

Raises:

ValueError – If destination path is empty.

static get_tree(path, allowed_ext)[source]

Builds file system tree filtered by allowed extensions.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Root directory path.

  • allowed_ext (List[str]) – List of allowed file extensions.

Return type:

Directory

Returns:

Directory tree containing only files with allowed extensions.
